description: This interface defines a server for ISO15118-3 SLAC protocol to pair PLC devices on MAC layer

DLINK_TERMINATE.description: D-LINK_TERMINATE_request: Leave AVLN and resets state to UNMATCHED.

DLINK_ERROR.description: The D-LINK_ERROR.request requests lower layers to terminate the data link and restart the matching process by a control pilot transition through state E.

DLINK_PAUSE.description: The D-LINK_PAUSE.request requests lower layers to enter a power saving mode. While being in this mode, the state will be kept to MATCHED.

DLINK_READY.description: The D-LINK_READY.indication shall inform higher layers about a change of communication link status. This indication shall be sent with any change in link status. The values of the D-LINK_READY status are independent of the states of the control pilot signal. Emits true if link was set up and false when the link is shut down.
